name: Mr. Rainbow
description:
Mr. Rainbow Is the master of the weather! He Can call clouds and start storms! but, recently he lost almost all his powers and needs your help to get them back!

Made For the GDKO 2022 in 2 and a half days.

Credits:

Pixel Art Clouds.
